title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! 2: Kono Subarashii Geijutsu ni Shukufuku wo!
synopsis: Kazuma meets a novice adventurer called Ran who claims to be Kazuma's fan. A quest is proposed to Kazuma and his party in front of Ran, so he accepts the quest to look good in front of his fan; after some convincing, they all go to fight the metal golem.
characters: ['Megumin', 'Satou, Kazuma', 'Aqua', 'Dustiness Ford, Lalatina', 'Komekko', 'Luna', 'Head Researcher', 'Mitsurugi, Kyouya', 'Ran', 'Bishoujo Golem']
voices: ['Takahashi, Rie', 'Fukushima, Jun', 'Amamiya, Sora', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Hara, Sayuri', 'Cho', 'Eguchi, Takuya', 'Akasaki, Chinatsu', 'Nabatame, Hitomi']
staff: [['Kanasaki, Takaomi', ['Director']], ['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Akatsuki, Natsume', ['Original Creator']], ['Mishima, Kurone', ['Original Character Design']]]
